document_data.name: ''Pen of Oghma''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Pens of Oghma''''' were minor, but convenient, [[magic item]]s used by [[cleric]]s of [[Oghma]], the Lord of Knowledge.<ref name=FaA-p133">
document_data.Powers: A ''pen of Oghma'' was a quill enchanted to never break, provide their own source of light controllable by the wielder that was bright enough to read and write by, and create their own neverending supply of ink that never ran or blotched.<ref name=FaA-p133"/>
